Name: Manual_Fellowship_Chakraa
description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

2025.09.02.description:
* NEW: This AP! 🎉
* FIXED: Bug with the push precollected items that wouldn't count towards the goal using `|@Instances:ALL|`.
   * Thanks to @nicopop on Discord for the assist on this. A new patch to Manual will fix this in the future and I won't have to manually compensate for it.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-Fellowship/commits/2025.09.02
2025.09.02.title: 2025.09.02 - Initial Release

2025.09.12.description:
* Changed the AP World to now be a Hero hunt, find the hero items, complete dungeons
* There are no longer any dungeon items or locations to find
* You can now remove heroes from the pool if you do not wish to play them

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-Fellowship/compare/2025.09.02...2025.09.12
2025.09.12.title: 2025.09.12 - Total Logic Revamp
